titles.title: Fill all my vision, Savior, I pray

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Fill all my vision, Savior, I pray, Let me see only Jesus today; Though through the valley Thou leadest me, Thy fadeless glory encompasseth me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Fill all my vision, Savior divine, Till with Thy glory my spirit shall shine. Fill all my vision, that all may see Thy Holy Image reflected in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Fill all my vision, every desire Keep for Thy glory; my soul inspire With Thy perfection, Thy holy love, Flooding my pathway with light from above.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Fill all my vision, let naught of sin Shadow the brightness shining within. Let me see only Thy blessed face, Feasting my soul on Thy infinite grace.
